content: i think we all can agree with gudetama that sometimes the answer is just meh see the full blog post ** here 1 ** happy hooking you re free to sell finished products you make from my patterns but copying and distributing the patterns themselves is prohibited just credit me @geekyhooker and link back to the pattern if you sell online tag me in your photos on social media i love seeing how everything turns out 1 https //geekyhooker com/bottoms-up/
